segments.advisor_message: So, to get started, could you share with me what specific goals or objectives you have in mind for today’s session?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, so I was thinking, like, I wanna, hmm, maybe start saving for a house? But also, I kinda wanna invest in stocks? And also, retirement planning is on my mind too.

segments.advisor_message: Great, those are all important areas to focus on. Let’s delve into each one. What do you feel is your priority right now?
segments.client_message: Um, well, I think maybe the house thing? But also, I mean, stocks are like really interesting, and retirement, uh, like, I don't have a whole lot set up there yet. So yeah, I guess it’s kinda all over the place, really.
